cover_prompt: A solitary 18th-century naturalist in a worn wool coat kneels in a cleared Scottish glen, his hand hovering over a single, resilient bluebell pushing through scorched earth and tree stumps, a leather-bound field journal open beside him filled with precise sketches, [Detailed Scene & Context: the vast, mist-shrouded Highland landscape behind him bears the scars of recent clearance, with the ghostly outlines of former crofts and the distant, imposing silhouette of a departing landlord's estate on the horizon], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric and melancholic style of a Caspar David Friedrich painting, rendered with the textured, luminous realism of a John Atkinson Grimshaw nocturnal scene, using oil on canvas with visible brushwork and glazing], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and poignant composition viewed from a low angle that emphasizes the naturalist's isolation against the vast, wounded landscape, dramatic and contemplative], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting from a low, cold twilight sun breaking through pewter clouds, casting long, sorrowful shadows, color palette of somber heather purples, moss greens, charred umbers, and the stark, hopeful blue of the flower against the grey mist], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
